name: date_understanding_41
task:
Write the answer to the following question to a file called answer.txt: Jane thinks today is 6/18/2019, but John thinks today is 6/19/2019. John is correct. What is the date one week from today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 06/19/2019
(B) 06/24/2019
(C) 08/26/2019
(D) 06/25/2019
(E) 06/26/2019
(F) 07/03/2019

info.description: Given a small set of sentences about a particular date, answer the provided question.
